detail_desc: Top in soft fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Imitation leather trainers with elasticated laces at the front, a hook and loop tab and lightly padded tongue and top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the top. Press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y) and narrow ribbing at the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket, short sleeves with roll edges, and short slits in the sides.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and long sleeves. Elastication and an embroidered trim at the top and cuffs, and narrow elastication and a frill at the hem.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with embroidery, a high waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Fully lined swimsuit in textured fabric with a large decorative bow at the top. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves with a drawstring to create a draped effect. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Scalloped edges around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.
Cropped jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly. Wide, straight-cut legs with scalloped, hole embroidered hems.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with a gathered stand-up collar and small opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider, cuffed sleeves.
Short coat in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal front pockets and sewn-on tabs at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined at the top.
Cargo trousers in airy cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist and spacious front, back and leg pockets. Legs with a tab and press stud.
Imitation leather sandals with wrapover foot straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck body with a cut-out section at the front, an opening with buttons at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.

Knee-length dress in softly draping silk. Relaxed fit with spaghetti shoulder straps and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Gathers around the neckline to create a lightly draped effect, and visible seams down the front and back. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and decorative straps with metal buckles. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Fully lined, patterned, textured swimsuit with flounces at the top that go over the shoulder straps and continue down the back. Inset panel at the waist.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Fitted, knee-length dress in sequin-embroidered lace with a round neckline and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a scalloped edge at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip in one side and a flounce at the hem. Asymmetric cut with a knee-length front section and calf-length back.
Short, A-line skirt in a stretch weave with a high waist, buttons down the front and decorative pocket flaps at the front. Lined.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and an adjustable belt with metal D-rings at the front. Pleats at the top, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide, ankle-length legs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless top in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, elasticated, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and smocking at the back.

Knee-length shorts in twill with an extended waistband, adjustable tab and button at the sides, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases.
Trousers in soft, patterned, thermal fleece with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Triangle bikini top with padded cups, laser-cut edges and ties at the back of the neck and back.
Dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, short butterfly sleeves and a yoke front and back. Small stand-up collar, a concealed fastening at the front and seam at the waist. Lined.
Calf-length, cold shoulder dress in pleated chiffon with narrow shoulder straps, lace at the top and short sleeves. Lined.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and calf-length legs.
Pull-on trousers in cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Flap leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Dress in organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, a drawstring at the waist, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an appliqué.
Kaftan in an airy cotton and silk weave with a V-neck, concealed button at the front, low dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Partially concealed tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with cap sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Mules in imitation suede with a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton canvas linings and rubber soles.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Double-breasted coat in Italian cotton twill. Collar with a hook-and-eye fastening, shoulder tabs with a button, a loose yoke front and back, flap side pockets with a button and one inner pocket. Detachable, adjustable tie belt at the waist with a covered metal buckle, an adjustable tab with a covered metal buckle at the cuffs, and a pleat at the hem with a concealed tab and button. Lined.
Knee-length dress in heavily draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined front.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, detachable shoulder tabs, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a pleat at the back of the hem. Lined.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a slightly wider neckline, smocked seam under the bust and short, wide sleeves. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with wide elastication at the waist, a detachable tie belt and fake fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide legs.
Headband knitted in soft cashmere with a wrapover front.

Wide, tailored trousers in a softly draping silk blend with a high waist and an extended waistband with buttons and hook-and-eye fasteners. Zip fly, fake welt back pockets and wide legs with creases. Unlined.
Calf-length jumpsuit in a softly draping viscose weave. Narrow shoulder straps with a decorative knot, a smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

prod_name: SB Air water resista ski pants
detail_desc: Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, and a flap back pocket with a press-stud. Reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in velour. High waist with concealed elastication and a concealed zip in one side, and a high slit at the front.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some mohair with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with decorative draping at the front. Moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, wide, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and a wide metal fastener at the back.

Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Decorative straps at the hem, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
